metadata.name: Coda Genesis #1
metadata.description:
The Coda Genesis NFT collection consists of 10,000 high quality NFTs and are the first access pass to the Coda streaming platform. Coda is the first streaming site that lets listeners actively invest in their favorite artists through security compliant NFTs. This launch is a means to provide Coda with further operating capital as we continue to grow as a company. Holders will be the first group of people invited and gain unique utility within the platform. This utility includes but is not limited to;

- A large share of our ERC-20 token used to unlock exclusive features within the site.
- A special place in our community discord.
- High revenue sharing/referral payments.
- Access to lucrative music NFTs from big name artists.
- Profile verification that shows you were one of our original 10,000 users.
- Future airdrops and giveaways as a thank you for being one of our original users.

Visit [CodaStreaming](https://CodaStreaming.com) for more information.
